original_title: Anunayake Thero of Asgiri Chapter passes away
original_body_lines: The Anunayake of the Asgiri Chapter, Most Venerable Anamaduwe Dhammadassi Thero, has passed away at the age of 67.
Venerable Anamaduwe Dhammadassi Thero, who had been receiving treatment at a private hospital following a heart attack, reportedly passed away last night (20).
